xwikidoc.title: WebHome
xwikidoc.content:
1.1.1 Welcome to your new space
You have just created a new space. A space is a place designed to share information about a topic, a project, a department... To this aim, a set of applications is available to help you publish content :
* A blog : the blog is a place where you can post news and start discussions. * A wiki : the wiki provides you with the ability to create new pages and edit them together. * A file manager : the file manager let you upload files (such as Excel sheets & PDFs) to make them available to other space members. * An picture gallery : the picture gallery is specifically meant to publish and share images and photographs.
Panels on the left provide you with a list of current members of the space and displays existing categories.
1.1.1 Getting started
You may want to edit this page to replace its content with an introduction stating what this space is all about and why it was created for.
